exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || 'ç”·é¢‘';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'tab') || 'å°è¯´';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'sources') || 'ç•ªèŒ„';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('æ‚¨è¿˜æœªç™»é™†ç•ªèŒ„è´¦å·ï¼Œæ— æ³•åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®å“¦ï¼');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqtjurl = base_url + "/fqrecommend?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqlsurl = base_url + "/fqhistory?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("ç•ªèŒ„ç™»å½•è¿‡æœŸï¼Œå·²éšè—ç•ªèŒ„ä¹¦æ¶");
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½åˆ†ç»„æ•°æ®...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : 'æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·';
        if (!userName.includes('æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·')) {
            infoData = [{
                title: "ç•ªèŒ„ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ",
                url: fqsjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "ä¸ªæ€§æ¨è(ç•ªèŒ„)",
                url: fqtjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "å†å²é˜…è¯»(ç•ªèŒ„)",
                url: fqlsurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }];
        }
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("ç•ªèŒ„ç™»å½•è¿‡æœŸï¼Œå·²éšè—ç•ªèŒ„ä¹¦æ¶");
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("å‘ç°æ ·å¼è·å–å¤±è´¥");
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let qtop = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
qtop = JSON.stringify(qtop);
let qtsjurl = base_url+'/get_book_shelf,'+qtop
let qtsj = [{
                title: "æ™´å¤©ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ",
                url: qtsjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }]
var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
finalData = qtsj.concat(finalData);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'sources') || getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'source');
let disabled_sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'disabled_sources') || '0';
if (String(key).startsWith("m:") || String(key).startsWith("mï¼š")) {
    media = "æ¼«ç”»"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("t:") || String(key).startsWith("tï¼š")) {
    media = "å¬ä¹¦"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:") || String(key).startsWith("dï¼š")) {
    media = "çŸ­å‰§"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:") || String(key).startsWith("xï¼š")) {
    media = "å°è¯´"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else {
    media = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'tab') || getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'media');
}
if (key.includes('@')) {
    var parts = key.split('@');
    key = parts[0];
    sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let op = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}&disabled_sources=${disabled_sources},${op}`
</js>

            let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie('https://www.69shuba.com'));

}
result

    let cookieValue;

            //java.log(cookieValue)

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {

}

let nickname = 'è´¦å·çŠ¶æ€ï¼šâš ï¸ æœªç™»å½• | ç‚¹å‡»å³ä¸Šè§’ ğŸ”– ç™»å½•';

        }
    }
} catch (e) {

};

let loginStatus = nickname;

let lightDivider = "â‡ï¸â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â‡ï¸â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â‡ï¸";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;
let ctitle = book.durChapterTitle || 'æœªå¼€å§‹';
let info = `
    ğŸ“¡ å½“å‰æœåŠ¡ï¼š${base_url}
    ğŸ”‘ ${loginStatus}
    ğŸ· æ•°æ®æ¥æºï¼š${sources}
    ğŸ”„ å½“å‰æ¨¡å¼ï¼š${tab}
    âš™ï¸ è®¿é—®æ¨¡å¼ï¼š${proxy}
    ğŸ“– é˜…è¯»è‡³ï¼š${ctitle}
`;

if (tab == "å¬ä¹¦") {
    //let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
    let toneId = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
    if (toneId == '') {
    	toneId= '4';
    	}
    if (isValid(book_tts)) {
        info += `${lightDivider}
    ğŸµ éŸ³è‰²é…ç½®ï¼š${toneId}
    âœ¨ AIéŸ³è‰²è¯·ç‚¹å‡»å³ä¸Šè§’ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡å¡«å†™ç›¸å…³å€¼ï¼ŒçœŸäººå¬ä¹¦è¯·é‡æ–°æœç´¢é€‰æ‹©å¸¦æœ‰ä¸»æ’­çš„ä¹¦ç±
    ${book_tts}
`;
    }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
    if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "ä¹¦ç±åˆ†ç±»ï¼š", "ğŸŒˆ");
addBasicInfo(role, "ä¹¦ç±ä¸»è§’ï¼š", "ğŸ‘‘");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š", "ğŸ“š");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š", "â³");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "ä¹¦ç±å­—æ•°ï¼š", "ğŸ“Š");
addBasicInfo(status, "ä¹¦ç±çŠ¶æ€ï¼š", "ğŸš©");
addBasicInfo(score, "ä¹¦ç±è¯„åˆ†ï¼š", "â­");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
        .split("\n")
        .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
        .join("\n");
    info += `${heavyDivider}

${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
    info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    Â© ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
    info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    ğŸ’ ğŸ’ ğŸ’  æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°äº ${new Date().toLocaleString()} ğŸ’ ğŸ’ ğŸ’ 
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "off") {
    info = String(info)
        .split("\n")
        .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
        .join("\n");
} else {
    basicInfo = "";
    addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š", "ğŸ“š");
    addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š", "â³");
    addBasicInfo(word_number, "ä¹¦ç±å­—æ•°ï¼š", "ğŸ“Š");
    addBasicInfo(status, "ä¹¦ç±çŠ¶æ€ï¼š", "ğŸš©");
    addBasicInfo(score, "ä¹¦ç±è¯„åˆ†ï¼š", "â­");
    if (isValid(abstract)) {
        let indentedAbstract = abstract
            .split("\n")
            .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
            .join("\n");
        basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    ğŸ“– ä¹¦ç±ç®€ä»‹ï¼š
${indentedAbstract}
`;
    } else {
        basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
    }
    info = `‎\nğŸ· æ•°æ®æ¥æºï¼š${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

        .replace("source", "sources")

}

        html = java.startBrowserAwait(url, "éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯").body();

};

    }
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);

if (varia == 'null') {

});

    `${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`
);

    device_type = "è‹¹æœ";
} catch (e) {

        device = java.androidId();

    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    }
}

if (tab == "å°è¯´") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 0;
    }
} else if (tab == "å¬ä¹¦") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 32;
    } else {
        book.type = 1;
    }
} else if (tab == "æ¼«ç”»") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 64;
    } else {
        book.type = 2;
    }
} else if (tab == "çŸ­å‰§") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 3;
    }
} else {

        book.type = 8;
    } else {

    }

if (book && book.order != 0 && reading == '1') {
    try {
        if (!data || !book.variable || !base_url || !qtcookie) {
            java.log('ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦å‚æ•°');

                java.log('è§£ædataæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:' + e);

            if (parsedData && parsedData.data && Array.isArray(parsedData.data) && parsedData.data[book.durChapterIndex]) {

                let bookInfoObj;

                    bookInfoObj = JSON.parse(book.variable);

                        book_info = JSON.parse(bookInfoObj.book_detail || JSON.stringify(bookInfoObj));
                    } catch (e) {
                        java.log('è§£æbook_detailå¤±è´¥:' + e);
                    }
                    
                    if (book_info && typeof book_info === 'object') {
                        let rurl = base_url + '/add_book_to_book_shelf,';
                        book_info['read_status'] = 1;
                        book_info['last_chapter_item_id'] = ritem.item_id || '';
                        book_info['last_chapter_title'] = ritem.title || '';
                        let rop = {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                cookie: qtcookie
                            },
                            body: book_info
                        };
                        let check_book_url = base_url + '/check_book_in_book_shelf,';
                        let checkResponse;
                        
                        try {
                            checkResponse = java.ajax(check_book_url + JSON.stringify(rop));
                        } catch (e) {
                            java.log('æ£€æŸ¥ä¹¦ç±è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:' + e);
                        }
                        
                        if (checkResponse) {
                            let check_data;
                            try {
                                check_data = JSON.parse(checkResponse).data;
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('è§£ææ£€æŸ¥å“åº”å¤±è´¥:' + e);
                            }
                            try {
                                if (check_data && check_data.id) {
                                    book_info['id'] = check_data.id;
                                    let uurl = base_url + '/update_book_shelf,';
                                    java.ajax(uurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                } else {
                                    java.ajax(rurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('ä¹¦æ¶æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:' + e);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    } catch (error) {
        java.log('ä¹¦ç±åŒæ­¥æµç¨‹å¼‚å¸¸:' + error);
        java.longToast('\nåŒæ­¥é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½†ä¸å½±å“é˜…è¯»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‰å¾€ç™»å½•å…³é—­ä¹¦æ¶åŒæ­¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚');
    }
}
data;
</js>$.data
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let tab = result.tab;
let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;
let book_id = java.get("book_id");
let url = result.toc_url || "";
let qtcontent = {
    book_id: book_id,
    item_id: item_id,
    title: title,
    sources: sources,
    tab: tab,
    url: url,
};
qtcontent = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(qtcontent));
if (sources == 'å·') {
    content_url = item_id
} else if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    var base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server") || "";
    var sdtoken;
    try {
        var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
        sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
    } catch (e) {
        sdtoken = '';
    }
    var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
    var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
    var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
    var fqssionid = '';
    if (!fqcookie) {} else {
        fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
    }
    let sourcess = sources.replace('svip_', '');
    content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3","js":"book ? result : '${base_url}/get_review?book_id=${book_id}&item_id=${item_id}&ssionid=${fqssionid}&source=${sourcess}'"}`;
} else {
    content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3"}`;
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
java.log(result)
result = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let res;
if (result.match(/æ™´å¤©èåˆ/)) {
    result = result.split("æ™´å¤©èåˆ4");
    res = {
        item_id: result[0],
        tab: result[1],
        title: result[2],
        sources: result[3],
        url: ""
    };
} else {
    res = JSON.parse(result);
}
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
if (varia == 'null') {
    varia = '';
}
varia = JSON.stringify({
    'custom': varia
});
//  varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
let book_id = res.book_id;
let item_id = res.item_id;
let tab = res.tab;
let title = res.title;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "æœ¬åœ°") {
    if (sources == '69ä¹¦å§') {
        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie('https://www.69shuba.com'));
        let headers = {
            "Referer": url,
            "Cookie": ck69,
            "User-Agent": java.getWebViewUA()
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        java.log(url);
        java.log(op);
        html = java.ajax(`${url},${op}`);
    } else {
        html = java.ajax(url);
    }
    java.log('dddddddddddddddddddddddddddd')
    java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69ä¹¦å§' && book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
        cookie.removeCookie('https://www.69shuba.com');
        java.longToast('éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯');
        html = java.startBrowserAwait(url, "éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯").body();
        java.log('cscscscs')
        java.log(html);
    }
};
let content = "";
let data;
//let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
let tone_id = varia;
if (tone_id == '') {
    tone_id = '4';
}
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let fqpara = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara");
let device, device_type;
try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "è‹¹æœ";
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.androidId();
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    }
}

let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
try {
    qtcookie = `qttoken=${String(cookie.getKey(base_url, "qttoken"))}; deviceId=${device};`
} catch (e) {}

var params = {
    html: html,
    item_id: item_id,
    source: sources,
    tab: tab,
    tone_id: tone_id,
    variable: varia,
    version: '4.11.5.1'
};

var content_url = '/content';
if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && fqpara && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    content_url = '/content?review=1';
}

//var signInfo = generateComplexSignature('POST', content_url, {}, APP_SECRET, params);


//var signedParams = copyObject(params);
//signedParams.timestamp = signInfo.timestamp;
//signedParams.nonce = signInfo.nonce;
//signedParams.sign = signInfo.sign;


var op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: JSON.stringify(params),
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
};

op = JSON.stringify(op);
java.log(op);
data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url + `,${op}`);
try {
    data = JSON.parse(data);
    if (data.msg) {
        java.toast(data.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {}
content = data.content
if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && fqpara == "on" && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    var sdtoken;
    try {
        var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
        sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
    } catch (e) {
        sdtoken = '';
    }
    var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
    var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
    var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
    var fqssionid = '';
    if (!fqcookie) {} else {
        fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
    }
    content = content
        .replace(/ident="/g, 'ident="' + base_url)
        .replace(/book_id=/g, 'book_id=' + book_id + '&ssionid=' + fqssionid);
    if (device_type == "è‹¹æœ") {
        content = paraForiOS(content, sources);
    } else {
        content = paraForAndroid(content, sources);
    }
}
data = JSON.stringify({
    content: content,
});
if (device_type == "å®‰å“" && (tab == "çŸ­å‰§" || tab == "è§†é¢‘" || sources == 'æ¯’èˆŒå½±è§†')) {
    data = {
        content: `ã€å³ä¸Šè§’åˆ·æ–°ã€‘å¼€å¯æ’­æ”¾(ä¸‹ä¸€é›†è¯·åˆ‡æ¢ä¸‹ä¸€ç« åˆ·æ–°)\næ’­æ”¾ç›´é“¾ï¼š\n${content}`,
    };
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
    if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
        let video_url = `${base_url}/online_video?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}`;
        if (sources == 'æ¯’èˆŒå½±è§†') {
            video_url = content;
        };
        java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
        java.toast("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½è§†é¢‘...");
    }

}
data;

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() || {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["æœªåˆ†ç»„"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = xGorgon(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32&device_id=1024&device_type=114514&iid=2048",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index]
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(tab))
  tab = tab.cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data.video_info || result.data})
</js>
